Items.Name: Escape
Items.Description: An Adventure where you need to run away

Items.Name: Destroy the MacGuffin in Mount Doom
Items.Description: An adventure where you must destroy the MacGuffin in Mount Doom
Items.DescriptionTemplate: To destroy the {{Faction.Boss}}'s source of power and end the threat of the {{Faction}} You must take the {{MacGuffin}} to Mount Doom and cast it into the flames

Items.Name: Steal the MacGuffin
Items.Description: An Adventure where you need to steal the MacGuffin
Items.DescriptionTemplate: You must steal the {{MacGuffin}} from {{Faction.Boss}} and escape from {{Faction}}
